divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside for a cigarette, and was looking at the stars, I noticed one really bright star (just checked and it is west of Orion at 7:12pm). When I was looking I saw what I thought to be an airplane, I watched it for a minute and didn't see the normal flicker of lights that an airplane would have. I kept watching it and called my wife out to see it as it kept moving east. She came outside and I told her that it could be the ISS or a satellite. It was moving in a straight line, She and I were looking at it as we noticed it became significantly dimmer, and then slowly faded out of sight within 3-4 seconds.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Hayward
There were no other sightings in Hayward on or around January 16th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Looked like a bright star, noticed it was moving eastward at really high altitude
